row.Body: Now that the Engineer update has come, there will be lots of Engineers building up everywhere. How should this best be handled?
row.Title: What is a good strategy to deal with lots of engineers turtling on the other team?

row.Body:
Steam won't let me have two instances running with the same user logged in.

Does that mean I cannot run a dedicated server on a PC (for example, for Left 4 Dead 2) and play from another machine?

Is there a way to run the dedicated server without running Steam? Is there a configuration option I'm missing?
row.Title: How can I run a dedicated server without Steam?

row.Body: When I get to the insult sword-fighting stage of The Secret of Monkey Island, do I have to learn every single insult and comeback in order to beat the Sword Master?
row.Title: Do I have to learn all of the insults and comebacks to be able to advance in The Secret of Monkey Island?

row.Body: No, you can fight the sword master without knowing all the comebacks. It's all a matter of luck which insults she throws at you.
What are some well-written guides to follow to discover and explore different aspects of WoW, including but not limited to leveling, raiding, professions, classes?
row.Title: What are some well-written guides for World of Warcraft?

row.Body:
Thankfully no, you don't have to learn them all. It is a bit tedious to get all the comebacks.

This is because to beat the Sword Master you only need to do comeback for a subset of all the insults. But it requires some luck.
